title: Old diaries, 1881-1901 /
author: Gower, Ronald Sutherland
snippet: Mr Hamiltonshowed me over the house, which is small, but clean andwell-aired. The following Sunday I went to St Philip's Church, inthe City, to hear Mr Carlile preach ; a very close, hotday. Again in the evening I went to St Mary's "At Hill,"where he held a kind of Salvation service out of doors,with band and banners ; this is followed by a magiclantern in the church, but having to dine with theMarshalls, I could not stay for it.
